overview: Hold onto your hats, kiddies...this is gonna BLOW YOU AWAY! Ten bodacious beach beauties take you on a wild ride of excitement, electricity and fun as they compete in the world-famous "Teenie-Weenie Bikini Contest!" Our lucky winner is then crowned with the prestigious title of "Best Buns on the Beach" - and competition is FIERCE! SEE why these sexy sirens of the sandy shores are "tops" when it comes to bottoms while you witness all the action taking place LIVE on stage in Hollywood, California!
tagline: The most fun you can have without being there!
title: Best Buns on the Beach
